The dashboard provides a complete overvi: The dashboard provides a complete overview of the most important data that allows you to effectively manage and analyze your business
Here you will find a complete list of pr: Here you will find a complete list of products that you can easily view, edit and delete
On this page you can easily add a new pr: On this page you can easily add a new product to your offer. Complete the form to enter product details and save it in the system
On this page you can easily add a new ca: On this page you can easily add a new category for your products. Complete the form to enter category details and save it in the system
Here you will find a complete list of ca: Here you will find a complete list of product categories that you can easily view, edit and delete
On this page you can view your complete: On this page you can view your complete sales history in an easy-to-read table. We also offer the ability to export data, which facilitates further analysis and archiving
On this page you can enter the details o: On this page you can enter the details of a new sales transaction. Complete the form to register the sale in the system
On this page you can customize your prof: On this page you can customize your profile by changing your profile picture and setting your preferred profile color theme
On this page you can view all messages s: On this page you can view all messages sent by other users. The message list allows you to quickly access correspondence and manage communication
On this page you can write and send a ne: On this page you can write and send a new message. This also allows you to set the priority of your message, which will help it stand out
On this page you will find a table with: On this page you will find a table with the full list of users. You can view basic information about each of them
On this page, available only to administ: On this page, available only to administrators, you can add a new user to the system. Complete the form to enter your new account details
